articles.author: Jonathan Noble
articles.title: Imola F1 weekend faces disruption amid red alert weather warning - Motorsport.com
articles.description: Formula 1’s Emilia Romagna Grand Prix faces risk of disruption from rain this weekend, with the region currently under a red alert weather warning.
articles.content:
With Italy already having faced a spell of adverse weather this month, which has triggered storms and floods, the situation has shown no sign of improving this week.
On Monday evening, things became… [+2041 chars]
